jobs.title: Game Master
jobs.description:
Part-time opportunity!

We are looking for sociable, passionate and confident Games Masters to join our fun, diverse and creative team in our top quality escape rooms in London, Aldgate East.

You will be trained on hosting our customers, giving them their game briefing with excitement and passion. Debriefing the players after the game.

Previous experience acting, working with customers and dealing with high pressure situations is desired, but not essential.

Wage: £8/hour with the minimum availability of 18 hours/week

If you think you would like to work in a fun, creative and rewarding role at a leading escape room, send your CV to eni@aimescape.com.
